sentences.english: The geographical field exercitation is an important part of the geographical teaching process in universities.
sentences.chinese: 地理野外實習是高校地理教學過程中的重要教學環節。

sentences.english: Interning in college increases your chances of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 在校期間實習將增加你找到工作的機會。

sentences.english: I needed to travel or volunteer or take an unpaid internship.
sentences.chinese: 我需要去旅行，做志願者或者去做無薪實習生。

sentences.english: They said we can only offer paid positions to rising seniors.
sentences.chinese: 公司說只能提供有薪實習項目給高年級同學。

sentences.english: Some people just, you know, go right ahead and try to get internships with investment banks.
sentences.chinese: 有的學生直接就嘗試去投資銀行找實習。

sentences.english: The main contradiction of preparing for postgraduate examination and internship is time conflict.
sentences.chinese: 考研與實習的矛盾主要是時間衝突的矛盾。

sentences.english: Businesses might inquire interns to receive college credit for their experience.
sentences.chinese: 有些公司會要求實習生出示學校給的信用證明。

sentences.english: The position of trainee is much the same as that of an intern in a hospital.
sentences.chinese: 見習員的地位和醫院裏的實習醫生很相似。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about an internship program that students can participate in?
sentences.chinese: 你能給我們介紹一個學生可以參加的實習項目嗎？

sentences.english: Kitchens will be staffed by a base of full-time chefs together with a stream of trainee chefs on work experience.
sentences.chinese: 廚房將配備專職廚師，還有一些實習生。

sentences.english: Don't know how to parlay an internship into a full-time position?
sentences.chinese: 不知道怎樣把握實習機會獲得一份全職工作？

sentences.english: Some luxury companies recruit for sales trainees at China's top universities.
sentences.chinese: 部分奢侈品公司在中國最好的大學中招募銷售實習生。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effectiveness of pre-job training on nursing interns.
sentences.chinese: 目的對護理實習生崗前培訓效果進行探討。

sentences.english: Does Wuhan have advertizing company recruit the graphic designing probationer's?
sentences.chinese: 武漢哪有廣告公司招平面設計實習生的？

sentences.english: Richards suggests that you scope out internship sites with the greatest number of listings.
sentences.chinese: 理查茲建議，你應該去尋找實習崗位數量最多的網站。

sentences.english: Ms. Mogilner took an internship to 'show her commitment' to her new career path.
sentences.chinese: 莫吉內通過實習來顯示自己對新的職業道路的執着。

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to go to school/to attend school
